Computer Networks focus on how devices communicate and share information across local and global infrastructures. This field covers network design, routing, switching, wireless communication, and the protocols that make the internet function. Network engineers ensure that systems remain fast, stable, and secure.

This field suits individuals who enjoy technical problem‑solving, system design, and understanding how digital communication works. People who are analytical, patient, and comfortable with hardware and software integration excel in networking.

In Iran, computer networks are essential in telecommunications, ISPs, enterprise IT, and data centers. Internationally, networking professionals are needed in cloud companies, global tech firms, and cybersecurity organizations.

Studying computer networks typically involves learning routing protocols, network topologies, wireless systems, and tools like Cisco, MikroTik, and Wireshark.
shortIntroduction: Computer Networks connect devices and systems to enable communication and data exchange.

title: LAN / WAN
introduction:
LAN (Local Area Network) and WAN (Wide Area Network) are foundational networking concepts that define how devices communicate within small areas or across long distances. LANs connect devices within homes, offices, or campuses, while WANs link networks across cities, countries, or global infrastructures.

This field suits individuals who enjoy configuring hardware, optimizing network performance, and solving connectivity issues. People who are detail‑oriented and comfortable with structured technical work excel in LAN/WAN management.

In Iran, LAN/WAN specialists are needed in enterprises, ISPs, and government networks. Internationally, they play key roles in global corporations, telecom providers, and cloud infrastructure teams.

Studying LAN/WAN involves learning routing, switching, cabling, wireless systems, and network troubleshooting.
shortIntroduction: LAN/WAN technologies manage local and wide-area networks for efficient communication across small and large environments.

title: Wireless Networks
introduction:
Wireless Networks focus on enabling communication without physical cables, using technologies such as Wi‑Fi, Bluetooth, and cellular networks. This field ensures that mobile devices, IoT systems, and modern infrastructures stay connected reliably and securely.

This field suits individuals who enjoy working with radio technologies, troubleshooting connectivity issues, and optimizing network performance. People who are analytical and curious about wireless communication excel in this area.

In Iran, wireless networking is widely used in telecom companies, ISPs, and smart city projects. Internationally, it is essential for mobile networks, IoT ecosystems, and enterprise wireless systems.

Studying wireless networks involves learning radio frequency concepts, wireless protocols, antenna design, and network security.
shortIntroduction: Wireless Networks enable devices to communicate without cables using Wi‑Fi, cellular, and radio technologies.

title: Network Protocols
introduction:
Network Protocols are the rules and standards that govern how data is transmitted, received, and interpreted across networks. Protocols like TCP/IP, HTTP, DNS, and DHCP ensure that devices communicate efficiently and reliably.

This field suits individuals who enjoy understanding system internals, analyzing data flow, and solving communication problems. People who are detail‑oriented and comfortable with technical specifications excel in protocol analysis.

In Iran, protocol expertise is needed in ISPs, enterprise IT, and cybersecurity teams. Internationally, it is essential in cloud computing, networking companies, and global internet infrastructure.

Studying network protocols involves learning OSI layers, packet structures, routing, and diagnostic tools like Wireshark.
shortIntroduction: Network Protocols define the rules and standards that enable devices to communicate across networks.

title: Cybersecurity
introduction:
Cybersecurity focuses on defending systems, networks, and data from cyber threats such as hacking, malware, and unauthorized access. It involves risk assessment, security monitoring, incident response, and implementing protective technologies.

This field suits individuals who enjoy solving complex problems, thinking like an attacker, and staying updated with evolving threats. People who are analytical, detail‑oriented, and persistent excel in cybersecurity.

In Iran, cybersecurity is a rapidly growing field in banking, government, and enterprise IT. Internationally, it is one of the most in‑demand tech sectors, offering roles in SOC teams, security engineering, penetration testing, and digital forensics.

Studying cybersecurity typically involves learning network security, cryptography, ethical hacking, and security frameworks. Hands‑on labs and certifications significantly boost career opportunities.
shortIntroduction: Cybersecurity protects systems, networks, and data from digital attacks and unauthorized access.

title: Network Security
introduction:
Network Security focuses on securing computer networks by preventing unauthorized access, attacks, and data breaches. It involves configuring firewalls, intrusion detection systems, VPNs, and monitoring tools to ensure safe communication.

This field suits individuals who enjoy defensive strategies, analyzing threats, and maintaining secure infrastructures. People who are detail‑oriented and comfortable with technical troubleshooting excel in network security.

In Iran, network security roles are common in banks, telecom companies, and government IT departments. Internationally, it is a core part of cybersecurity teams in global enterprises.

Studying network security involves learning encryption, firewalls, secure protocols, and threat detection tools.
shortIntroduction: Network Security protects networks from unauthorized access, attacks, and data breaches.

title: Cryptography
introduction:
Cryptography is the science of securing information through mathematical algorithms that encrypt, authenticate, and protect data. It is essential for secure communication, digital signatures, blockchain, and modern cybersecurity.

This field suits individuals who enjoy mathematics, logical reasoning, and solving abstract problems. People who are analytical and detail‑oriented excel in cryptography.

In Iran, cryptography is used in banking, secure communications, and national security systems. Internationally, it is vital in cybersecurity, blockchain technologies, and secure software development.

Studying cryptography involves learning number theory, encryption algorithms, hashing, and secure communication protocols.
shortIntroduction: Cryptography secures information by using mathematical techniques to encrypt and protect data.

title: Ethical Hacking & Penetration Testing
introduction:
Ethical Hacking & Penetration Testing focuses on identifying vulnerabilities in systems by simulating real cyberattacks. Ethical hackers use specialized tools and techniques to uncover weaknesses before malicious attackers exploit them.

This field suits individuals who enjoy problem‑solving, curiosity-driven exploration, and thinking like an attacker. People who are persistent, analytical, and comfortable with technical challenges excel in penetration testing.

In Iran, ethical hacking is increasingly used in banks, cybersecurity firms, and government organizations. Internationally, it is a high-demand field with roles in security consulting, SOC teams, and red‑team operations.

Studying ethical hacking involves learning network security, exploitation techniques, vulnerability scanning, and tools like Metasploit, Burp Suite, and Kali Linux.
shortIntroduction: Ethical Hacking identifies security weaknesses by legally testing systems through simulated attacks.

title: Malware Analysis
introduction:
Malware Analysis involves examining malicious software to understand how it works, how it spreads, and how to defend against it. Analysts reverse-engineer malware, study its code, and identify indicators of compromise to support cybersecurity defenses.

This field suits individuals who enjoy deep technical analysis, reverse engineering, and solving complex puzzles. People who are patient, detail‑oriented, and comfortable with low-level programming excel in malware analysis.

In Iran, malware analysis is used in cybersecurity centers, government agencies, and research labs. Internationally, it is a critical skill in threat intelligence, incident response, and security research.

Studying malware analysis involves learning assembly language, reverse engineering tools, sandboxing, and behavioral analysis techniques.
shortIntroduction: Malware Analysis studies malicious software to understand its behavior and develop defenses against it.

title: Systems & Hardware
introduction:
Systems & Hardware is the field that explores how computers function at their core, covering operating systems, distributed systems, and hardware architecture. It focuses on the interaction between software and physical components, ensuring performance, reliability, and efficient resource management. Professionals in this field work on building the foundations that modern applications rely on.

This field suits individuals who enjoy low-level problem-solving, understanding how systems work internally, and optimizing performance. People who are analytical, detail-oriented, and comfortable with both hardware and software concepts excel in systems and hardware.

In Iran, this field is essential in telecommunications, embedded systems, and enterprise IT. Internationally, it offers strong opportunities in cloud computing, operating system development, hardware engineering, and infrastructure roles.

Studying systems and hardware typically involves learning operating systems, computer architecture, distributed systems, and low-level programming. Hands-on experience with Linux, virtualization, and hardware tools is highly valuable.
shortIntroduction: Systems & Hardware focuses on how computers operate at the system, hardware, and infrastructure levels.

title: Operating Systems
introduction:
Operating Systems (OS) are the foundational software that manage hardware resources, run applications, and provide essential services such as memory management, process scheduling, and file systems. They ensure that computers operate efficiently and securely.

This field suits individuals who enjoy low-level programming, system design, and understanding how computers work internally. People who are analytical, patient, and comfortable with complex technical concepts excel in OS development.

In Iran, OS expertise is valuable in enterprise IT, embedded systems, and cybersecurity. Internationally, it is essential in cloud computing, system engineering, and operating system development.

Studying operating systems typically involves learning process management, concurrency, memory systems, file systems, and kernel architecture. Hands-on work with Linux and OS simulators is crucial.
shortIntroduction: Operating Systems manage hardware resources and provide the core environment for running applications.

title: Windows / Linux / macOS
introduction:
Windows, Linux, and macOS are the three dominant operating systems used across personal computers, servers, and enterprise environments. Each system has its own architecture, tools, and ecosystem, making OS proficiency essential for system administration, development, and IT operations.

This field suits individuals who enjoy system configuration, troubleshooting, and understanding OS internals. People who are analytical and comfortable with command-line tools excel in OS specialization.

In Iran, Linux and Windows administration are widely used in data centers, enterprise IT, and DevOps teams. Internationally, OS expertise is essential in cloud computing, cybersecurity, and software engineering.

Studying these operating systems involves learning system commands, file systems, process management, and administrative tools.
shortIntroduction: Windows, Linux, and macOS are major operating systems that power personal computers and enterprise environments.

title: Kernel Development
introduction:
Kernel Development involves designing and modifying the core part of an operating system that manages hardware, memory, processes, and system calls. Kernel developers work at the lowest software level, ensuring performance, stability, and hardware compatibility.

This field suits individuals who enjoy low-level programming, debugging, and understanding how computers operate internally. People who are detail-oriented and skilled in C programming excel in kernel development.

In Iran, kernel development is mostly found in research labs, embedded systems, and specialized tech companies. Internationally, it is a highly technical field with opportunities in OS companies, hardware manufacturers, and cloud providers.

Studying kernel development involves learning C, operating system internals, device drivers, and memory management.
shortIntroduction: Kernel Development focuses on building and modifying the core component of an operating system.

title: Distributed Systems
introduction:
Distributed Systems focus on designing systems where multiple computers work together to provide scalable, reliable, and fault-tolerant services. These systems power cloud platforms, large-scale applications, and global services like databases, messaging systems, and microservices.

This field suits individuals who enjoy system design, solving large-scale challenges, and working with cloud technologies. People who are analytical and comfortable with algorithms and infrastructure excel in distributed systems.

In Iran, distributed systems are used in fintech, telecom, and enterprise software. Internationally, they are essential in cloud computing, big tech companies, and high-traffic platforms.

Studying distributed systems involves learning consensus algorithms, replication, fault tolerance, and cloud-native architectures.
shortIntroduction: Distributed Systems coordinate multiple computers to work together as a unified, scalable system.

title: Cloud Computing
introduction:
Cloud Computing provides computing power, storage, and services over the internet, allowing organizations to scale quickly without managing physical hardware. Cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud power modern applications, distributed systems, and global infrastructures.

This field suits individuals who enjoy working with large-scale systems, automation, and modern infrastructure. People who are analytical and comfortable with DevOps tools excel in cloud computing.

In Iran, cloud adoption is growing in startups and enterprise IT. Internationally, cloud computing is one of the most in-demand fields in technology.

Studying cloud computing involves learning virtualization, containerization, cloud services, and infrastructure automation.
shortIntroduction: Cloud Computing delivers computing resources over the internet, enabling scalable and on-demand services.

title: Microservices & Scalability
introduction:
Microservices & Scalability involve designing systems as small, independent services that can scale horizontally to handle increasing traffic. This approach improves flexibility, reliability, and deployment speed in modern applications.

This field suits individuals who enjoy distributed systems, architecture design, and solving performance challenges. People who are analytical and comfortable with DevOps and cloud tools excel in microservices.

In Iran, microservices are widely used in fintech and large-scale web platforms. Internationally, they are standard in cloud-native and high-traffic applications.

Studying microservices involves learning API design, containerization, orchestration, and scalability patterns.
shortIntroduction: Microservices & Scalability focus on building modular systems that grow efficiently under heavy load.

title: Computer Architecture
introduction:
Computer Architecture focuses on how computers are built at the hardware level, including processors, memory systems, and input/output components. It explores how hardware executes instructions, manages data, and interacts with software.

This field suits individuals who enjoy hardware design, low-level programming, and understanding how computers work internally. People who are analytical and comfortable with mathematics and logic excel in computer architecture.

In Iran, computer architecture is used in embedded systems, hardware design, and academic research. Internationally, it is essential in CPU/GPU design, semiconductor companies, and high-performance computing.

Studying computer architecture involves learning digital logic, processor design, memory hierarchies, and hardware-software interaction.
shortIntroduction: Computer Architecture studies how processors, memory, and hardware components are designed and interact.

title: CPU / GPU Architecture
introduction:
CPU/GPU Architecture focuses on designing the internal structure of processors that execute instructions and handle graphics or parallel workloads. CPU architects optimize performance and efficiency, while GPU architects design massively parallel systems for graphics and AI.

This field suits individuals who enjoy hardware engineering, performance optimization, and low-level computation. People who are analytical and comfortable with digital logic and computer architecture excel here.

In Iran, CPU/GPU architecture is mostly found in research and embedded systems. Internationally, it is a high-demand field in semiconductor companies, AI hardware firms, and high-performance computing.

Studying CPU/GPU architecture involves learning digital circuits, instruction pipelines, parallel computing, and hardware simulation tools.
shortIntroduction: CPU/GPU Architecture designs the internal structure of processors that power computing and graphics workloads.

title: Embedded Systems
introduction:
Embedded Systems focus on designing hardware-software solutions that control devices such as sensors, robots, appliances, and industrial machines. These systems are optimized for reliability, low power consumption, and real-time performance.

This field suits individuals who enjoy hands-on engineering, low-level programming, and working with electronics. People who are detail-oriented and comfortable with hardware constraints excel in embedded systems.

In Iran, embedded systems are widely used in automation, IoT, and electronics manufacturing. Internationally, they are essential in automotive, robotics, aerospace, and consumer electronics.

Studying embedded systems involves learning microcontrollers, C/C++ programming, real-time operating systems, and circuit design.
shortIntroduction: Embedded Systems integrate hardware and software to control devices like sensors, robots, and electronics.

title: Robotics
introduction:
Robotics is the field dedicated to creating machines capable of performing physical tasks through mechanical design, electronics, and intelligent control. It combines engineering, computer science, and automation to build robots that assist in manufacturing, healthcare, exploration, and daily life. Robotics continues to expand as AI and sensors become more advanced.

This field suits individuals who enjoy hands-on engineering, problem‑solving, and integrating hardware with software. People who are curious, analytical, and comfortable with mathematics, physics, and programming excel in robotics.

In Iran, robotics is growing in industrial automation, academic research, and robotics competitions. Internationally, it offers strong opportunities in manufacturing, autonomous systems, aerospace, and service robotics. Careers include robotics engineer, automation specialist, and control systems developer.

Studying robotics typically involves learning mechanics, electronics, control theory, programming, and AI. Practical experience with robotics kits, simulators, and real hardware is essential.
shortIntroduction: Robotics focuses on designing, building, and programming machines that can perform physical tasks autonomously or semi‑autonomously.

title: Industrial Robotics
introduction:
Industrial Robotics focuses on designing and deploying robots used in factories and production lines. These robots perform tasks such as welding, assembly, packaging, and material handling with high precision and speed. Industrial robots improve efficiency, safety, and consistency in manufacturing environments.

This field suits individuals who enjoy mechanical systems, automation, and optimizing industrial workflows. People who are detail‑oriented and comfortable with engineering tools excel in industrial robotics.

In Iran, industrial robotics is widely used in automotive manufacturing, electronics assembly, and industrial automation. Internationally, it is a major component of Industry 4.0, offering opportunities in global manufacturing companies.

Studying industrial robotics involves learning control systems, mechanical design, PLC programming, and industrial automation technologies.
shortIntroduction: Industrial Robotics develops robots used in manufacturing, automation, and high‑precision industrial tasks.

title: Autonomous Robots
introduction:
Autonomous Robots are machines capable of performing tasks without human intervention by using sensors, perception systems, and intelligent algorithms. They navigate environments, make decisions, and adapt to changing conditions, enabling applications such as self‑driving vehicles, drones, and service robots.

This field suits individuals who enjoy AI, control systems, and working with dynamic, real‑world environments. People who are analytical, creative, and comfortable with experimentation excel in autonomous robotics.

In Iran, autonomous robots are emerging in research labs, drone development, and industrial automation. Internationally, they are central to robotics innovation in transportation, logistics, and smart systems.

Studying autonomous robots involves learning perception, motion planning, control theory, and embedded programming.
shortIntroduction: Autonomous Robots operate independently using sensors, AI, and decision‑making algorithms.

title: Intelligent Robotics
introduction:
Intelligent Robotics combines artificial intelligence with robotics to create machines that can learn, reason, and adapt to their environment. These robots use machine learning, computer vision, and decision‑making algorithms to perform complex tasks that require autonomy and intelligence.

This field suits individuals who enjoy AI, robotics, and solving high‑level challenges involving perception and reasoning. People who are analytical, curious, and comfortable with advanced algorithms excel in intelligent robotics.

In Iran, intelligent robotics is growing in academic research and AI‑driven automation. Internationally, it is a rapidly expanding field in autonomous vehicles, service robots, and advanced manufacturing.

Studying intelligent robotics involves learning machine learning, computer vision, motion planning, and robot control.
shortIntroduction: Intelligent Robotics integrates AI with robotics to create machines capable of learning, reasoning, and adaptive behavior.

title: AI Integration
introduction:
AI Integration focuses on embedding artificial intelligence into robotic systems to improve perception, decision‑making, and adaptability. It enables robots to understand their environment, learn from data, and perform tasks more intelligently.

This field suits individuals who enjoy combining AI algorithms with real‑world robotics applications. People who are analytical, innovative, and comfortable with machine learning and programming excel in AI integration.

In Iran, AI integration is used in research labs and emerging robotics startups. Internationally, it is essential in autonomous vehicles, drones, and intelligent service robots.

Studying AI integration involves learning machine learning, computer vision, reinforcement learning, and embedded AI systems.
shortIntroduction: AI Integration applies artificial intelligence techniques to enhance robotic perception, decision‑making, and autonomy.

title: Motion & Path Planning
introduction:
Motion & Path Planning focuses on calculating safe, efficient, and feasible paths for robots to navigate through their environment. It ensures robots can avoid obstacles, reach targets, and operate smoothly in dynamic settings.

This field suits individuals who enjoy algorithms, geometry, and solving spatial problems. People who are analytical and comfortable with mathematics and simulation tools excel in motion planning.

In Iran, motion planning is used in robotics research and drone development. Internationally, it is essential in autonomous vehicles, warehouse robots, and service robotics.

Studying motion planning involves learning graph algorithms, optimization, kinematics, and tools like ROS and simulation environments.
shortIntroduction: Motion & Path Planning determines safe and efficient routes for robots to move through their environment.

title: Quantum Computing
introduction:
Quantum Computing is an advanced field that uses the principles of quantum mechanics—such as superposition and entanglement—to perform computations that classical computers cannot handle efficiently. Quantum computers have the potential to revolutionize fields like cryptography, optimization, and scientific simulation.

This field suits individuals who enjoy theoretical thinking, mathematics, and exploring cutting‑edge technology. People who are analytical, curious, and comfortable with physics and algorithms excel in quantum computing.

In Iran, quantum computing is mostly explored in academic research and physics departments. Internationally, it is rapidly growing in tech companies, research labs, and government-funded programs.

Studying quantum computing involves learning quantum mechanics, linear algebra, quantum algorithms, and programming frameworks like Qiskit or Cirq.
shortIntroduction: Quantum Computing uses quantum mechanics to perform computations far beyond the capabilities of classical computers.

title: Quantum Algorithms
introduction:
Quantum Algorithms are computational methods designed to run on quantum computers, using quantum properties to achieve speedups over classical algorithms. Famous examples include Shor’s algorithm for factoring and Grover’s algorithm for search.

This field suits individuals who enjoy algorithm design, mathematics, and theoretical computer science. People who are analytical and comfortable with abstract reasoning excel in quantum algorithm research.

Internationally, quantum algorithm development is a major focus in research labs and tech companies working on quantum hardware.

Studying quantum algorithms involves learning quantum gates, circuit models, complexity theory, and quantum programming languages.
shortIntroduction: Quantum Algorithms leverage quantum principles to solve problems faster than classical algorithms.

title: Quantum Cryptography
introduction:
Quantum Cryptography uses quantum mechanics to create secure communication systems that cannot be intercepted without detection. Techniques like Quantum Key Distribution (QKD) provide unprecedented levels of security by leveraging the behavior of quantum particles.

This field suits individuals who enjoy physics, cryptography, and exploring next‑generation security technologies. People who are analytical and comfortable with mathematical and physical concepts excel in quantum cryptography.

Internationally, quantum cryptography is growing in government security, telecommunications, and advanced research institutions.

Studying quantum cryptography involves learning quantum mechanics, encryption principles, QKD protocols, and optical communication systems.
shortIntroduction: Quantum Cryptography secures communication using quantum principles that make eavesdropping detectable.

title: Computer Graphics
introduction:
Computer Graphics is the field dedicated to generating and manipulating visual content using computational techniques. It includes 2D and 3D graphics, animation, rendering, and visual effects used in games, movies, simulations, and design tools. The field blends creativity with technical skill, enabling the creation of realistic or stylized digital visuals.

This field suits individuals who enjoy visual creativity, problem‑solving, and working with both artistic and technical tools. People who are detail‑oriented, imaginative, and comfortable with mathematics and programming excel in computer graphics.

In Iran, computer graphics is widely used in animation studios, game development, architecture visualization, and advertising. Internationally, it offers strong opportunities in film production, gaming, VR/AR, and simulation industries.

Studying computer graphics typically involves learning 3D modeling, rendering algorithms, animation principles, and graphics programming using tools like Blender, Maya, Unity, Unreal Engine, and OpenGL.
shortIntroduction: Computer Graphics focuses on creating, manipulating, and visualizing digital images and 3D content.

title: 3D Modeling
introduction:
3D Modeling focuses on creating digital three‑dimensional objects, characters, and environments used in games, movies, simulations, and product design. Artists use specialized software to sculpt, shape, and texture models that bring digital worlds to life.

This field suits individuals who enjoy creativity, visual design, and attention to detail. People who are artistic, patient, and comfortable learning complex software tools excel in 3D modeling.

In Iran, 3D modeling is used in animation studios, architecture visualization, and advertising. Internationally, it is essential in gaming, film production, VR/AR, and industrial design.

Studying 3D modeling involves learning tools like Blender, Maya, ZBrush, and understanding topology, texturing, and digital sculpting.
shortIntroduction: 3D Modeling creates digital three‑dimensional objects for games, films, simulations, and design.

title: Animation
introduction:
Animation focuses on creating motion for digital characters, objects, and environments. It blends artistic expression with technical skill to produce lifelike or stylized movement used in films, games, advertisements, and simulations.

This field suits individuals who enjoy storytelling, creativity, and understanding how motion conveys emotion and personality. People who are patient, imaginative, and detail‑oriented excel in animation.

In Iran, animation is used in advertising, educational media, and film studios. Internationally, it is a major industry in entertainment, gaming, and digital content creation.

Studying animation involves learning keyframe animation, rigging, motion capture, and tools like Blender, Maya, and Unity.
shortIntroduction: Animation brings digital characters and objects to life through motion and storytelling.

title: Rendering Techniques
introduction:
Rendering Techniques focus on converting 3D models and scenes into final images or animations using lighting, shading, and simulation algorithms. Rendering determines how realistic or stylized a digital scene appears, using methods like ray tracing, rasterization, and global illumination.

This field suits individuals who enjoy mathematics, physics, and optimizing visual quality. People who are analytical, detail‑oriented, and comfortable with algorithms excel in rendering.

In Iran, rendering is used in architecture visualization, animation, and product design. Internationally, it is essential in film production, gaming, and real‑time graphics.

Studying rendering involves learning lighting models, shading languages, GPU programming, and tools like Blender Cycles, Arnold, and Unreal Engine.
shortIntroduction: Rendering Techniques generate final images from 3D scenes using lighting, shading, and simulation algorithms.

title: Game Development
introduction:
Game Development focuses on creating interactive digital experiences through programming, design, storytelling, and real‑time graphics. Developers build gameplay mechanics, physics systems, AI behaviors, and immersive worlds that players can explore.

This field suits individuals who enjoy creativity, problem‑solving, and building interactive systems. People who are imaginative, analytical, and comfortable with programming and design tools excel in game development.

In Iran, game development is growing in indie studios and mobile game companies. Internationally, it is a massive industry with opportunities in AAA studios, indie teams, VR/AR, and simulation companies.

Studying game development involves learning game engines, programming, physics, AI, and design principles using tools like Unity and Unreal Engine.
shortIntroduction: Game Development creates interactive digital experiences using programming, design, and real‑time graphics.

title: Game Engines
introduction:
Game Engines are software frameworks that provide the tools, physics systems, rendering pipelines, and scripting environments needed to build games. Engines like Unity and Unreal simplify development by offering ready‑made systems for graphics, audio, input, and gameplay logic.

This field suits individuals who enjoy system design, optimization, and building interactive tools. People who are analytical and comfortable with programming excel in engine development.

Internationally, game engine expertise is valuable in gaming, simulation, VR/AR, and real‑time visualization industries.

Studying game engines involves learning scripting, rendering, physics, and engine architecture.
shortIntroduction: Game Engines provide the core tools and systems needed to build and run interactive games.

title: Gameplay Programming
introduction:
Gameplay Programming focuses on implementing the mechanics, interactions, and systems that define how a game feels and plays. Gameplay programmers create character controls, combat systems, puzzles, AI behaviors, and interactive elements.

This field suits individuals who enjoy creativity, problem‑solving, and designing player experiences. People who are analytical, imaginative, and comfortable with programming excel in gameplay development.

In Iran, gameplay programming is common in indie and mobile game studios. Internationally, it is a core role in AAA studios and game development companies.

Studying gameplay programming involves learning scripting, physics, AI, and game design principles using engines like Unity and Unreal.
shortIntroduction: Gameplay Programming implements the mechanics, interactions, and behaviors that define a game's experience.

title: Physics Simulation
introduction:
Physics Simulation focuses on modeling realistic motion, forces, collisions, and interactions in digital environments. It enables believable movement for characters, objects, fluids, and particles in games and simulations.

This field suits individuals who enjoy mathematics, physics, and building realistic systems. People who are analytical and comfortable with algorithms excel in physics simulation.

Internationally, physics simulation is essential in gaming, VR/AR, robotics simulation, and scientific visualization.

Studying physics simulation involves learning mechanics, numerical methods, collision detection, and physics engines like Havok, PhysX, or Bullet.
shortIntroduction: Physics Simulation models realistic motion, forces, and interactions in games and digital environments.
